snippet: A United States Embassy official said credible evidence existed of a threat from a Peruvian terrorist group in the Cuzco region, which includes Machu Picchu.
abstract: Peruvian officials vehemently object to United States Embassy warning to American tourists about potential kidnapping threat in Cuzco region of Peru, which includes Incan citadel Machu Picchu.
lead_paragraph: A United States Embassy official said credible evidence existed of a threat from a Peruvian terrorist group in the Cuzco region, which includes Machu Picchu.

headline.seo: Peru Objects to U.S. Embassy’s Warning to Tourists
headline.main: Peru Objects to U.S. Embassy’s Warning to American Tourists
headline.print_headline: Peru Objects to U.S. Embassy’s Warning to American Tourists
